title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip') and begin export to the zip file.
OB: When trying to export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up stating that 'Problems were encountered during export', and the detail lists the file of the same name in 'project2' as the problem (i.e., 'foo.txt' in 'project2').
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip') and begin export to the zip file.

Expected result: The zip file should be successfully created without any error messages, able to store files with the same name under different directories.
